summary: A total remake of the Hjerim player home in Wind Helm for true Nord luxury.
descriptionHtml:
Description:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is a complete rework of the Player House Hjerim in Windhelm.
I didnt like the confined spaces of the original house and also felt that I liked the Idea of the house being lit on fire and rebuilt after what happened there so here it is.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you have any suggestions or find any bugs leave a comment! 

[youtube]c_WBAAFikfo[/youtube]
(I have fixed all the flaws seen in this video as well as any others I could find)

Notes:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any swag left in chests will be gone. Also I have no idea if it will work with the quest Skyrim:Blood on the Ice I kept all original clues pertaining to the quest but could not test it because I have already completed it. If your concerned about this quest see below!


How To:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To bypass the part where you investigate the house follow these instructions:
hit the console command (`)
Type: SetStage MS11 70
(or replace 70 with 250 to complete the quest all together)
see http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Blood_on_the_Ice for reference
also:
 http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Use-the-Skyim-Console-to-Get-Past-Broken-Quests-on-the-PC-242822.shtml
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: CappsGrad
